title: DIFOTO Company Website by Asen Sokolov
descr: Web developer based in Dubai, UAE. With more than 8 year experience and more than 100 project behind his back as a part of Xec-studio family.

generalInfo:
DIFOTO is a UAE based group of photographers specializing in sporting events, advertising and commercial photography and videography, family and kids, underwater shoots and weddings.

At DIFOTO believes that photography is more than just images but rather a way to preserve history. They aim to capture the best moments in life and deliver smiles through quality and professionalism.
typographyDescr: Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.
creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Design and develop a new mobile friendly photography website.

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: In order to create a fresh, interactive and modern website I used top trend techniques: parallax scrolling, large sized images, huge titles and eye catching fonts.

A feedback from my client Iordan Iordanov (Managing Director of DIFOTO) says it all:

Asen delivered my new website ahead of time and with a lot of attention to detail. Asen created a fresh, interactive and very up to date product. I have received many compliments on the new design of my website. Since the new website was launched my business revenues has more than doubled.

PROJECT DEVELOPED BY: Asen Sokolov
